description: Configure and manage Stytch authentication services and workspace settings
author: Stytch
content: Manage Stytch authentication configurations and workspace settings for identity management.

steps: Add the Stytch server configuration with HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http stytch http://mcp.stytch.dev/mcp

troubleshooting.solution: Stytch enforces rate limits per endpoint. Check error response for Retry-After header. Implement exponential backoff for retries. Review rate limits docs for specific endpoint limits. Contact support for increase requests.

troubleshooting.issue: Invalid redirect URL or scheme error
troubleshooting.solution: Add redirect URL in Stytch Dashboard under redirect_urls. Use https:// for production (http:// only for localhost loopback). Verify URL exact match (case-sensitive). Check no duplicate redirect URLs configured.

troubleshooting.issue: Misconfigured client or redirect URL not allowed
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure client has valid redirect_urls in Dashboard. Public clients require proper scheme (https or http loopback only). Localhost restrictions apply to certain clients. Verify client ID matches project.

troubleshooting.issue: Authentication failed or project access denied
troubleshooting.solution: Verify API keys match environment (test vs live). Check project_id and secret from Stytch Dashboard. Ensure user has project access permissions. Re-generate API keys if compromised. Review project security settings.
